A farm!

The carrot grows from a seed
into a carrot on the farm.
The farm is the source of carrot.

Energy sources are
Renewable or Non-Renewable

Renewable sources can be
easily replaced.
Non-renewable sources take
many years to renew.
Some can NEVER be recovered.
